lines.text: create long longs n , i , j , k and l
lines.code: long long n , i , j , k , l ;

lines.text: let a , b , c and d be long longs
lines.code: long long a , b , c , d ;

lines.text: read a , b , c and d
create long long l1 = absolute value of a - c
lines.code: long long l1 = abs ( a - c ) ;

lines.text: create long long l2 = absolute value of b - d
lines.code: long long l2 = abs ( b - d ) ;

lines.text: print the maximum of l1 and l2
